DOC.detailed_description: The investigator would like conduct randomize clinical trial compare efficacy diabetes treatment different gastric bypass procedure involve type 2 diabetic patient BMI 27.5 35 kg/m2 . This program determine relative effectiveness among LMGB 、RYGB SADJB .The primary end point include HbA1C < 6.0 % , LDL-C < 100mg/dl SBP < 130mmHg one year surgery . Through study , investigator may understand gastric bypass best type 2 diabetic 's treatment . The investigator also hope new treatment modulation may develop .

Willingness comply followup protocol Written inform consent . Cardiovascular event ( myocardial infarction , acute coronary syndrome , coronary artery angioplasty bypass , stroke ) past six month .
